snippet: As head of the University of Texas System, Dr. Francisco Cigarroa has found himself in the middle of public conflicts over the direction of the flagship university.
lead_paragraph: As head of the University of Texas System, Dr. Francisco Cigarroa has found himself in the middle of public conflicts over the direction of the flagship university.

headline.seo: Outgoing U.T. System Head Defends His Record
headline.main: In His Final Months, a Chancellor Rises to His Own Defense
headline.print_headline: In His Final Months, a Chancellor Rises to His Own Defense
